summary:
This mod let\'s you break down soul gems and make new ones from the dust of the old gems.
It is even possible to make reusable gems.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod I made Because I thought that the player should be allowed to create soul gems.
This is not free though and requires you to break down soul gems to dust and then use that dust to create new and more powerful ones.

All the crafting is done at the forge under the Misc section.

Since this is my first mod on the nexus site I don\'t know if I made the directory right and if there are any other stupid mistakes please forgive me.

You can find the crafting station in Dragonsreach, Whiterun in Farengar\'s office.
The Arcane Soul Gem is a reusable soul gem that is craftable.

Here follows a complete list of all values
-------------------------------------------------

petty soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 5 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 20 soul gem dust

lesser soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 10 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 40 soul gem dust

common soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 25 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 75 soul gem dust

greater soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 50 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 175 soul gem dust

grand soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 100 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 250 soul gem dust

black soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 150 soul gem dust
	- if full: turns into 375 soul gem dust

arcane soul gem
	- if empty: turns into 1250 soul gem dust
	- if full: You cannot make it into soul gem dust


5 soul gem dust turns into 1 petty soul gem

10 soul gem dust turns into 1 lesser soul gem

25 soul gem dust turns into 1 common soul gem

50 soul gem dust turns into 1 greater soul gem

100 soul gem dust turns into 1 grand soul gem

150 soul gem dust turns into 1 black soul gem

1250 soul gem dust turns into 1 arcane soul gem


I hope you enjoy the mod and if you like it plz endorse it.
author: Bloodeater

files.name: Equivalent Soul Gems
files.changelogHtml:
Added the possibility to pulverize filled soul gems.
Possible exploit to powerlevel Enchanting.
Added a crafting station to make the soul gems at.

files.name: Equivalent Soul Gems
files.changelogHtml: filled soul gems don't have a 1 to 1 ratio anymore, this is for balancing reasons.
